Solhint

This is an open source project for linting solidity code.

View on GitHub

comprehensive-interface

Description

Check that all public or external functions are override. This is iseful to make sure that the whole API is extracted in an interface.

Options

This rule accepts a string option of rule severity. Must be one of ‚Äúerror‚Äù, ‚Äúwarn‚Äù, ‚Äúoff‚Äù. Default to warn.

Example Config

{
  "rules": {
    "comprehensive-interface": "warn"
  }
}

Examples

üëç Examples of correct code for this rule

All public functions are overrides

pragma solidity ^0.7.0;

contract Foo is FooInterface {
  function foo() public override {}
}

üëé Examples of incorrect code for this rule

A public function is not an override

pragma solidity ^0.7.0;

contract Foo {
  function foo() public {}
}

Version

This rule is introduced in the latest version.
